review: It arrived quickly and was very easy to install.  I'm a prime member and had no difficulty finding free prime content.  The one thing keeping me from giving it five is that my son don't like playing games on it too much.  For example, when he plays a Sonic game, he finds that Sonic moves even when he isn't pushing the forward button on the controller and the same is true when he plays Minecraft.  Besides that, I would recommend it for anyone who is looking for an alternative to cable.
